reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A little pricey, but omg it smells so good. I'm committed to using deodorants without antiperspirant, but finding one that smells good, goes on smooth, and lasts has been tricky. I love how this one applies - goes on smooth and doesn't come off in chunks or get gritty. It feels a little moisturizing too which is nice. So far it's been lasting while I'm working, working out, or at school. It's winter, so I'm no getting super hot or sweaty even when I'm working out/going for a run outside. I'm a little annoyed that my cap was broken when I received it because this is a refillable tube and now I kind of want to buy a new one that has an intact lid. That's not the fault of the product though, just a mishap during shipping, so whatever. The price is on par with other "natural" deodorants, so while I feel like it's kind of a steep price tag, I also feel like I'm getting a sort of a twofer in that it smells so good it's almost like getting a body spray/perfume and deodorant all in one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best scented deodorant ever! Yep, I said it!
reviews.reviewText: I have been a Brazilian bum bum cream fan from this brand (Sol De Janerio) for years and years. If you have ever used the bum bum cream, you know how delicious this scent is!I noticed the brand also had a deodorant and purchased it immediately. The deodorant has the exact same scent as a the bum bum cream, which is so nice (and again, if you're a fan of the scent, you will know how awesome it is to be able to use it for your underarms).The scent, while amazing, does wear off pretty quick, so that's the only downside I have seen thus far.I love the roll on feature of the product, and the fact that it's refillable! You can purchase just the refills moving forward, which is great for your piggy bank and also the environment.Fantastic product overall.. I do not smell or sweat at all when wearing this, and am so glad I found it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Deodorant I have ever tried!
reviews.reviewText: I've always scoured Amazon for the reviews, but have personally never written one... until now.I have tried so many natural deodorants, and at some point I have to reapply them. However, this deodorant is magical. I applied at 5AM, worked all day (physical job, very sweaty) and when I got home (5PM) I noticed that I didn't smell ....anything!My underarms were very smooth, dry and scent-free/light scent remaining from product.I have been wearing it all week, and it has not stopped amazing me. I will be a forever customer as no other deodorants compare!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great scent, just wish it lasted longer.
reviews.reviewText: Great smell I’ve always loved this brands products. I just wished it was a long lasting deodorant. It’s great that it’s natural but it doesn’t last to long. I live in Florida so it’s humid often, along with I sweat a little more than the normal person. Other than that the scent lasts which I do like. I often mix my spray deodorant and this on top just so I can have the smell. I enjoy wearing it since I normally get compliments when I go out. One time I just had this and the body wash and 3 people asked what perfume I was wearing. Again I wish it’s sweat proof abilities lasted longer, but the scent lasts for hours!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Heavenly scent, great moisturizer for the area... Just not really long-lasting. :(
reviews.reviewText: Just like every other product from this line, the deodorant smells amazing, and while it does moisturize and treat the skin of my pits, it's not long-lasting, requiring me to reapply it at least once more throughout the day. What's been working for me is to use my old "nakd" brand crystal stone deo right after showering, then applying Rio Deo on top; it's an alternative, but it kinda defeats the purpose of the purchase, as I was actually looking for a replacement for the crystal stone (which is kind of a pain in the butt to apply, and it doesn't do much to address any skin concerns).If you're after an ANTIPERSPIRANT, this is NOT the product for you, as it DOES NOT PREVENT SWEATING. What some people don't seem to know is that there is a difference between deodorants (which aim primarily at neutralizing and/or eliminating body odor) and antiperspirants (which actually work on preventing you from sweating, thus avoiding the occurrence of b.o.); while some deodorants might have antiperspirant actives, not all of them are formulated as such - make sure you read your labels to avoid major disappointments and/or wasting your money.While I'm happy with the scent and the moisturizing factors, I'm not sure if I'll be purchasing this product again, as it's not as effective as I expected. If you're after some smelly-goodies and an extra touch of hydration in your pits, it's a nice alternative... Then again, make sure you read the label and know what you're after in your deodorant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for discoloration as wel.
reviews.reviewText: I alternate between this one and the kosas serum detract and have noticed a significant difference in the discoloration of my under arms. I’ve been looking for a solution to this problem for years and have finally found some. Now they’re everywhere, when they weren’t even on the market a few yrs ago it seems.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best deodorant yet!
reviews.reviewText: This does leave a little bit of white on the underarms at first but that does go away over a little time. This is my second one and I love that it doesn't burn my underarm area. I have very sensitive skin under there. This one does smell like cake batter so I will probably go back to my pink one once I use this up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smell great and helps absorb sweat
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been looking all over for a deodorant without aluminum that actually helps absorb sweat. I finally found that with this deodorant. It’s a bit pricey but I’m willing to pay since it’s the only one I’ve been able to find so far that actually helps with us sweaty folk! It does seem to run out pretty quickly so be aware if that when purchasing this. I would give it 5 stars if it didn’t run out so quickly
A little pricey. Because of that, I'm not sure I will buy again even though I absolutely love this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, refillable, sweet scent
Look at the photo. The deodorant is not usable!

reviews.reviewTitle: Finally aluminum free deodorant that works
reviews.reviewText: I would give it a 5 star review if it wasn’t for the fragrant. Smells like caramel pudding. Some people like and some people not so much.But works very well.It is very expensive…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this deodorant. I've been using it for a few years now and it's the best I found. Doesn't irritate the skin. And the smell is divine.
